title: National Defense and the Public Sector

content.question: National defense is generally provided by the public sector for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: The opportunity cost of privately providing national defense is too high.
The government always provides the socially optimal quantity.
National defense is a natural monopoly.
National defense is subject to negative externalities.
The benefits of national defense are mostly nonrival and nonexcludable.

content.answer: The benefits of national defense are mostly nonrival and nonexcludable.
